item.title: Pipelines
item.description: Source to Deploy, directly I had enough free time to throw together this project site over the holidays. Without any real networking knowledge, I snagged on basics for hours; the worst by far1 was the webhooks. Ultimately, the 3 guides I referenced didn’t mention that network points and nodes (?) have their own rules for port forwarding: Cloudflare has a very short whitelist2, Most distros, and particularly webhost distro images (I imagine), require port whitelisting through iptables/nftables backends typically managed with ufw Basically, any point along the source -> browser pipe can block you.
